Text.Name: FoodToHuman
Text.Desc: Naturally possesses high Qi Absorption capabilities.

Text.Name: FabaoToHuman
Text.Desc: Naturally possesses high artifact Qi recovery rate and conversion ratio.

Text.Name: DanToHuman
Text.Desc: There won't be any medicine tolerance produced the next time that you take a pill.

Text.Name: PlantToHuman
Text.Desc: Continues to grow slowly every day.

Text.Name: BuildToHuman
Text.Desc: Repairing Progress: {0}\n When the repairing progress reaches 100, all the lost limbs will be restored and the progress will return to zero.
